title: The Cute 〇〇〇〇 Elichika?
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>I saw your stream the other day, Eli-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You did? Thank you. Umm, may I ask how it was? I’ve never done a stream by myself, so I couldn’t really tell.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m happy that I got to see your bedtime routine, Eli-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I’m glad. But that wasn’t what I was asking for.... Were you able to get something from it? I consulted with Nozomi about it, but did you find my skincare ways and stretches useful?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Useful....? Umm, I thought you were really cute with your forehead hanging out while you were doing your skincare, Eli-chan~. Even though you’re usually so dignified, you looked a bit like a little girl that I just wanted to hug you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A-....a little girl? Is that so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Nozomi-chan is amazing. She knows so much about your charm points that she was able to come with a wonderful stream idea like that, huh, Eli-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s a little bit embarrassing.... I’ll give more thought about the contents of future streams.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeh!? But I want to see more of your cute side, Eli-chan! I want to see more of the cute Eli-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Stop calling me cute~! It’s embarrassing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
